nlp
Class TFIDFHandler

java.lang.Object
  nlp.TFIDFHandler

public class TFIDFHandler
extends Object

TFIDF handler class for posts in a discussion space. First, it sets up the tokenizer factories for the text content. They'll make every word lower case and throw out stop words. I use an additional stop words list to supplement this as well. A MyDocument object can be "handled" by this class by adding the object. All documents need to be added to this handler before the tf*idf values can be found for each word in each document.

Author:
kevin nam
